body:
Sportsynergy is a online court reservation platform.  
Designed and authored by Adam Preston.

We make software to manage your court schedules, run your 
leagues and keep your club running smoothly. For you and 
your club there is nothing to install or configure. We are 
so sure that you will find our service indispensable that 
we offer a money back guarantee.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Clubpro
